author: Brendan Cole
title: Italy Seizes $578M SY A Yacht of Andrey Melnichenko—Part of Putin's 'Closest Circle'
description: Video reportedly shows police board the industrialist's 470-foot SY A sailing yacht—thought to be the biggest in the world.
content:
Italian authorities have seized a superyacht worth $578 million from a Russian billionaire who was sanctioned by the the European Union following Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
